video.title: The Walking Dead
video.synopsis: In the wake of a zombie apocalypse, survivors hold on to the hope of humanity by banding together to wage a fight for their own survival.

episodes.synopsis: Rick searches for his family in a world terrorized by the walking dead. Morgan and Duane help teach Rick the new rules for survival.
episodes.title: Days Gone Bye

episodes.synopsis: Rick unknowingly causes a group of survivors to be trapped by walkers and must confront an enemy far more dangerous than the undead.
episodes.title: Guts

episodes.synopsis: Rick goes back to Atlanta to retrieve the bag of guns and save a man's life. Lori and Shane deal with the return of someone they thought was dead.
episodes.title: Tell It to the Frogs

episodes.synopsis: Rick's mission to Atlanta is jeopardized when things go awry. Jim becomes unhinged in the camp.
episodes.title: Vatos

episodes.synopsis: Rick leads the group to the CDC after the attack. Jim must make a terrible life and death decision.
episodes.title: Wildfire

episodes.synopsis: Rick and the group are allowed into the CDC by a strange doctor. But not all is what it seems in their newly found haven.
episodes.title: TS-19

episodes.synopsis: Rick leads the group out of Atlanta. On the highway, they are stopped by a threat unlike anything they have seen before. Someone goes missing.
episodes.title: What Lies Ahead

episodes.synopsis: Coming to the aid of another, Rick discovers a possible safe haven. Shane must go on a dangerous mission to get badly needed medical supplies.
episodes.title: Bloodletting

episodes.synopsis: The group desperately awaits Shane's return. Shane finds himself trapped in a school, surrounded by walkers. Daryl and Andrea search for someone.
episodes.title: Save the Last One

episodes.synopsis: Rick negotiates with Hershel to let the group stay on the farm while the others contend with an unusual threat. Glenn goes on a mission.
episodes.title: Cherokee Rose

episodes.synopsis: In the woods alone, Daryl finds a clue but is injured and attacked by walkers. Rick questions his choices. Glenn gets mixed signals from Maggie.
episodes.title: Chupacabra

episodes.synopsis: Glenn tries to keep two secrets. Andrea discovers a new skill and is forced to put it to the test. Rick learns something about someone close to him.
episodes.title: Secrets

episodes.synopsis: The group discovers a grave threat right under their noses. Rick works with Hershel to avoid a dangerous impasse. Dale confronts Shane.
episodes.title: Pretty Much Dead Already

episodes.synopsis: The group tries to restore order in the aftermath of a terrible discovery. Hershel disappears, Rick and Glenn must follow him into town.
episodes.title: Nebraska

episodes.synopsis: Trapped, Rick, Hershel and Glenn fight to survive against new foes, both dead and alive. Shane makes it his mission to bring Lori back to the farm.
episodes.title: Triggerfinger

episodes.synopsis: Rick and Shane come into conflict over the fate of a prisoner. Andrea helps Hershel's youngest daughter face a crucial decision.
episodes.title: 18 Miles Out

episodes.synopsis: Rick sides with Shane on an important decision. Dale worries that the group is losing its humanity. Carl's actions have unintended consequences.
episodes.title: Judge, Jury, Executioner

episodes.synopsis: The group learns that someone dangerous may be on the loose. As night falls, Rick, Shane, Daryl and Glenn comb the woods to handle the situation.
episodes.title: Better Angels

episodes.synopsis: Rick returns to find the farm in jeopardy. The group is split up in the ensuing chaos. With things looking grim, Rick's leadership is questioned.
episodes.title: Beside the Dying Fire

episodes.synopsis: With the world growing more dangerous and Lori's pregnancy advancing, Rick searches for a safer home for the beleaguered group.
episodes.title: Seed

episodes.synopsis: The shocking discovery of new foes further complicates matters as Rick and the group fight to save the life of one of their own.
episodes.title: Sick

episodes.synopsis: After witnessing an accident, Andrea and Michonne meet a new community of survivors who may not be as helpful as they seem.
episodes.title: Walk with Me

episodes.synopsis: Michonne and Andrea figure out their new surroundings as the group at the prison is forced to deal with multiple conflicts.
episodes.title: Killer Within

episodes.synopsis: Rick struggles to cope with his latest loss. Michonne remains suspicious of the Governor when he throws a party with a unique attraction.
episodes.title: Say the Word

episodes.synopsis: As Andrea grows closer to the Governor, Michonne makes a decision about Woodbury. Glenn and Maggie decide to go on a run.
episodes.title: Hounded

episodes.synopsis: The Governor shows his true colors as he presses for information. A new guest starts to stir things up at the prison.
episodes.title: When the Dead Come Knocking

episodes.synopsis: The group at the prison decides they must fight for their own as the people of Woodbury are thrown into uncharted territory.
episodes.title: Made to Suffer

episodes.synopsis: Rick tries to rescue a member of the group. Woodbury is in disarray after a recent attack. New guests raise concerns at the prison.
episodes.title: The Suicide King

episodes.synopsis: As the group debates their next course of action, Rick wanders after a friend. The Governor tries to restore order in Woodbury.
episodes.title: Home

episodes.synopsis: Their security threatened, Rick and the group must make a choice. Andrea decides to take matters into her own hands as Woodbury is in a police state.
episodes.title: I Ain't a Judas

episodes.synopsis: Realizing they are heavily outgunned against the Governor's forces, Rick decides to lead an expedition to get more weapons.
episodes.title: Clear

episodes.synopsis: In an effort to prevent any more deaths, Rick and the Governor decide to sit down and discuss the possibility of a peace treaty.
episodes.title: Arrow on the Doorpost

episodes.synopsis: The Governor chases a dissenter who fled Woodbury. While the Governor is gone, a traitor tries to sabotage his upcoming plans.
episodes.title: Prey

episodes.synopsis: Rick and the group are faced with a serious problem: If they want a truce with the Governor, they will have to make a huge sacrifice.
episodes.title: This Sorrowful Life

episodes.synopsis: Rick and the group have to seriously consider if the prison is worth defending as the Governor's impending attack looms.
episodes.title: Welcome to the Tombs

episodes.synopsis: Rick's group finds the prison has become a relatively safe base, but a close call with a stranger reminds them they can never let down their guard.
episodes.title: 30 Days Without an Accident

episodes.synopsis: Some of the survivors are quarantined to prevent a virus from spreading. Carol takes two girls under her wing, and Tyreese makes a shocking discovery.
episodes.title: Infected

episodes.synopsis: As the virus spreads, Hershel becomes a de facto medic, isolating some of the afflicted and sending the group to a veterinary college for supplies.
episodes.title: Isolation

episodes.synopsis: Bob's deception is revealed while the group tries to get medicine at the college; Rick and Carol discuss the consequences of Carol's confession.
episodes.title: Indifference

episodes.synopsis: In the quarantined zone at the prison, Hershel, Sasha and Glenn tend to the flu victims, who reanimate at an alarming rate.
episodes.title: Internment

episodes.synopsis: In a flashback, the Governor stumbles upon the apartment of adult sisters Lilly and Tara, their disabled father and Lilly's daughter, Meghan.
episodes.title: Live Bait

episodes.synopsis: Martinez rescues Meghan and the Governor from the pit and invites them to join his camp -- on the condition that they recognize him as the leader.
episodes.title: Dead Weight

episodes.synopsis: With Michonne and Hershel as their hostages, the Governor rallies his group for an attack on the prison, where all-out war ensues.
episodes.title: Too Far Gone

episodes.synopsis: Rick and Carl set out on their own to find supplies and hole up in an abandoned house, where Carl lashes out at his weakened father.
episodes.title: After

episodes.synopsis: Beth and Daryl search for survivors of the prison attack. Tyreese meets a father and son who tell him about a place of refuge called Terminus.
episodes.title: Inmates

episodes.synopsis: Michonne and Carl bond during a supply run, and Abraham pledges to get Eugene to Washington, D.C., to meet with government officials.
episodes.title: Claimed

episodes.synopsis: Beth and Daryl share an evening bonding over peach schnapps and moonshine when the tension at the camp grows too stifling.
episodes.title: Still

episodes.synopsis: Maggie splits off from Bob and Sasha when she finds a map to Terminus. Walkers besiege a funeral home where Daryl and Beth are hiding.
episodes.title: Alone

episodes.synopsis: On their way to Terminus, Tyreese's group finds a house that may be a safe haven, but Mika and Lizzie's strange behavior there threatens them all.
episodes.title: The Grove

episodes.synopsis: Glenn's group tries to catch up with Maggie and the others on the way to Terminus, and a squabble demonstrates the role of rules in this new reality.
episodes.title: Us

episodes.synopsis: As survivors cross paths on the way to Terminus, Rick comes face-to-face with sheer brutality and is pushed to the limit.
episodes.title: A

episodes.synopsis: Trapped in the train car, the terrified group waits to see what grisly fate their Terminus captors have in store for them. Gareth questions Rick.
episodes.title: No Sanctuary

episodes.synopsis: The group meets a priest who seems to be hiding something despite his hospitality. Later, Bob makes a horrifying discovery about Terminus.
episodes.title: Strangers

episodes.synopsis: Confronted by Rick and Sasha, Father Gabriel makes a startling confession. Abraham pushes the group to continue on to D.C., but Rick wants to wait.
episodes.title: Four Walls and a Roof

episodes.synopsis: An injured Beth wakes up in the hospital, where she's put to work tending to patients and tries to figure out whom she can trust.
episodes.title: Slabtown

episodes.synopsis: An accident stalls the group's push to Washington. After a horde of walkers attacks, a troubled Eugene confides in Rosita.
episodes.title: Self Help

episodes.synopsis: On the trail of the car with the white cross, Carol and Daryl wind up in Atlanta, where they spot another vehicle with the same symbol.
episodes.title: Consumed

episodes.synopsis: Rick's group tries to determine the best course of action in Atlanta, while Beth mounts her own rescue effort. Tara comes to Eugene's defense.
episodes.title: Crossed

episodes.synopsis: Father Gabriel, Carl and Michonne scramble to fend off walkers at the church. At the hospital, Rick negotiates a hostage exchange.
episodes.title: Coda

episodes.synopsis: The Atlanta group accompanies Noah to his hometown in Virginia, where he hopes to reunite with his family. But danger awaits.
episodes.title: What Happened and What's Going On

episodes.synopsis: Back on the road, the demoralized group searches desperately for food and takes refuge from a raging storm in an abandoned barn.
episodes.title: Them

episodes.synopsis: The group must decide whether a stranger's offering is a gift or a trap. Rick is suspicious, but Michonne decides to check out his story.
episodes.title: The Distance

episodes.synopsis: Rick and the other survivors are welcomed into the Alexandria safe zone, but they worry that the community is vulnerable to walkers.
episodes.title: Remember

episodes.synopsis: Carol devises a plan to sneak into the armory and steal weapons. Aaron enlists Daryl as a recruiting partner. Sasha offers to serve as a lookout.
episodes.title: Forget

episodes.synopsis: Abraham proves his worth in Alexandria during a walker attack. Deanna worries that the new arrivals may have too much power.
episodes.title: Spend

episodes.synopsis: Rick confronts Deanna about Pete. Glenn warns Nicholas not to leave the community. Daryl and Aaron come across a disturbing sight in the woods.
episodes.title: Try

episodes.synopsis: When Deanna calls a meeting to determine if Rick should be exiled, the group readies their defense. Aaron and Daryl track a man wearing a red poncho.
episodes.title: Conquer
